channel.title: virtualbox on Stefan Tobler
channel.description: Recent content in virtualbox on Stefan Tobler

item.title: How to Install Kali Linux on VirtualBox
item.description: Virtual machines are super useful! They allow users to create isolated environments for testing, running software that the host machine can’t, privacy reasons, and many more. At UGASCS we mainly use VMs to host all of the tools we need for CTFs and other cyber events.
